build.buildCommand: composer install --optimize-autoloader --no-scripts --no-interaction && npm install && npm run build && mkdir -p storage/app/public/berita storage/app/public/gallery storage/framework/{sessions,views,cache,testing} storage/logs bootstrap/cache && chmod -R 775 storage bootstrap/cache && php artisan storage:link || true

deploy.startCommand: php artisan storage:link || true && php artisan serve --host=0.0.0.0 --port=$PORT
